String.Source: Caves. Whether it be Skyrim, Cyrodiil, or the Kingdoms of High Rock, the unscrupulous often retreat to these lairs.
String.Dest: 洞穴。不管是在天际省, 赛瑞迪尔, 还是高岩省，那些无法无天的家伙都会躲进这样的洞里。

String.Source: I confess, I know little of Nord history, but all ancient ruins are haunted by vestiges of the past. Be on your guard.
String.Dest: 我承认我不怎么了解诺德人的历史。但是所有的古代遗迹都有一些"被时间遗忘之人".保持警戒。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. Unlike caves, in these monuments of metal and stone, the peril comes from below as opposed to above. Watch your step.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。不像山洞那样，在这些由金属和石头打造而成的遗迹里，危险并不是从地面而来，而是从地下而来。所以，注意脚下。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. Watch your step.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。看着点儿脚下。

String.Source: I had the wrong suspect. It was Grenier. This journal should clear things up.
String.Dest: 我猜错了。这是格雷尼尔。这本日记应该把事情讲的很清楚了。

String.Source: Then it was wise for us not to proceed with an arrest. Perhaps my previous experiences were of some help.
String.Dest: 这样看来我们停止了追捕还挺明智。也许我以前的经验还是有些用的。

String.Source: I had the wrong suspect. It was Grenier. This journal should clear things up.
String.Dest: 我猜错了。这是格雷尼尔。这本日记应该把事情讲的很清楚了。

String.Source: Thankfully, we avoided embarrassing ourselves and the accused. Moreover, with this journal, we can eliminate Grenier's place of business as well.
String.Dest: 好在我们没让自己和被告难看。而且有了这份报告，我们也能把格雷尼尔从生意圈挤走了。

String.Source: I had the wrong suspect. It was Grenier. This journal should clear things up.
String.Dest: 我猜错了。这是格雷尼尔。这本日记应该把事情讲的很清楚了。

String.Source: It appears Robber's Refuge is in the opposite direction of Azura's Shrine, but hopefully there's time for both.
String.Dest: 看来强盗庇护所是在阿祖拉祭坛相反的方向。所幸的是我们有时间能两个地方都去。

String.Source: I had the right suspect. This journal will implicate Grenier.
String.Dest: 我的怀疑是对的，日记将会牵连格雷尼尔。

String.Source: Nevertheless, this additional evidence should help solidify our case.
String.Dest: 当然了，这一额外的证据也能帮我们落实案情。

String.Source: I had the right suspect. This journal will implicate Grenier.
String.Dest: 我的怀疑是对的，日记将会牵连格雷尼尔。

String.Source: Moreover, it appears we can eliminate his place of business as well.
String.Dest: 更何况，看起来我们连他做生意的场子都能一锅端了。

String.Source: I had the right suspect. This journal will implicate Grenier.
String.Dest: 我的怀疑是对的，日记将会牵连格雷尼尔。

String.Source: It appears Robber's Refuge is in the opposite direction of Azura's Shrine, but hopefully there's time for both.
String.Dest: 看来强盗庇护所是在阿祖拉祭坛相反的方向。所幸的是我们有时间能两个地方都去。

String.Source: I killed Grenier. He did leave behind a journal, however.
String.Dest: 我杀了格雷尼尔，不过他真的背离了日志。

String.Source: I was hoping we could have him stand trial for his crimes, but I suppose the outcome is the same.
String.Dest: 我希望能让他为他的罪行接受审判,但我猜结果也不会改变。

String.Source: I killed Grenier. He did leave behind a journal, however.
String.Dest: 我杀了格雷尼尔，不过他真的背离了日志。

String.Source: Moreover, it appears we can eliminate his place of business as well.
String.Dest: 更何况，看起来我们连他做生意的场子都能一锅端了。

String.Source: I killed Grenier. He did leave behind a journal, however.
String.Dest: 我杀了格雷尼尔，不过他真的背离了日志。

String.Source: It appears Robber's Refuge is in the opposite direction of Azura's Shrine, but hopefully there's time for both.
String.Dest: 看来强盗庇护所是在阿祖拉祭坛相反的方向。所幸的是我们有时间能两个地方都去。

String.Source: I stole this journal off Grenier.
String.Dest: 这日记是我从格雷尼尔那偷来的。

String.Source: Normally I don't like resorting to thievery, but if it implicates him as the broker, the good may be worth the harm.
String.Dest: 一般而言来我不想诉诸偷鸡摸狗的办法，但如果牵扯到他作为中间人，那这样做就利大于弊了。

String.Source: I stole this journal off Grenier.
String.Dest: 这日记是我从格雷尼尔那偷来的。

String.Source: Moreover, it appears we can eliminate his place of business as well.
String.Dest: 更何况，看起来我们连他做生意的场子都能一锅端了。

String.Source: I stole this journal off Grenier.
String.Dest: 这日记是我从格雷尼尔那偷来的。

String.Source: It appears Robber's Refuge is in the opposite direction of Azura's Shrine, but hopefully there's time for both.
String.Dest: 看来强盗庇护所是在阿祖拉祭坛相反的方向。所幸的是我们有时间能两个地方都去。

String.Source: Deneris mentioned an aspect of Azura.
String.Dest: 丹尼勒斯提及了阿祖拉的某些事儿。

String.Source: Then it would be wise to start with the shrine to the north.
String.Dest: 从北面的神殿开始是明智的。

String.Source: Deneris mentioned an aspect of Azura.
String.Dest: 丹尼勒斯提及了阿祖拉的某些事儿。

String.Source: Incidentally, were you able to find anything on the broker?
String.Dest: 顺便问一下,你在那个中间人那里找到什么了么?

String.Source: We need to find a way to kill a ghost.
String.Dest: 我们必须找到杀死幽灵的办法。

String.Source: Not an easy task, seeing as it is already dead. Perhaps, as with the Oblivion Crisis, there may be a way to banish the unwanted from our realm.
String.Dest: 不是个简单的活，毕竟对手早就死了。也许我们可以把这些不需要的都放逐掉，像湮灭危机那时一样。

String.Source: A nightblade named Deneris is murdering his former guild mates.
String.Dest: 一个叫丹尼勒斯的夜刃正谋杀他的同行。

String.Source: So it seems. Moreover, it appears this is no ordinary killer, but an apparition. How does one vanquish what is already dead?
String.Dest: 似乎是这样的。而且，看起来这不是个普通的杀手，而是个幽灵。怎么才能打败一个已经死去的人呢？

String.Source: Do you think removing the broker will have an effect?
String.Dest: 你觉得干掉中间人会有效果吗？

String.Source: I do. Yes, people will always have the motivation to do harm to others. Sometimes they're nothing more than passing thoughts.
String.Dest: 我也觉得。是啊，人们总是有各种各样的理由去加害别人。有时这些理由不过是一闪而过的念头。

String.Source: Do you think removing the broker will have an effect?
String.Dest: 你觉得干掉中间人会有效果吗？

String.Source: The difference is now there is a means to transform these emotions into violent acts. One that does not require a pact with Sithis.
String.Dest: 不同的是现在决定态度要变强硬. 强硬到不需要和铁匠铺签约。

String.Source: Do you think removing the broker will have an effect?
String.Dest: 你觉得干掉中间人会有效果吗？

String.Source: The broker is a weapon. Remove him, and all that's left are the motives.
String.Dest: 中间人正是制约这一切的武器。 如果把他也排除出去，那么剩下的就只有最原始的欲望了。

String.Source: Where did you get this?
String.Dest: 你从哪儿搞的？

String.Source: When the murders began to rise, the nightblade in Markarth sent me this letter. Supposedly he had stolen it from Black-Briar Lodge.
String.Dest: 当谋杀案的数量开始增加时，夜刃从马卡斯城给我寄了这封信。据说这是他从黑荆棘别墅偷来的。

String.Source: What if I figure out who the broker is?
String.Dest: 如果我能查出中间人是谁呢？

String.Source: Learning his identity is good enough for now. We don't want to expose him until we know if he keeps the city guard in his employ.
String.Dest: 知道他的身份就现阶段而言已经足够好了。除非可以确认他把守卫们收作了走狗，在那之前，我们并不打算拆穿他。

String.Source: At least you feel something. I feel numb to everything.
String.Dest: 至少你还能感觉到什么，我对任何东西都只能感到麻木。.

String.Source: I once felt that way myself, but when we defended Kynesgrove, the sensation returned to my fingers. As did my sense of honor.
String.Dest: 我曾经也那样觉得，但当我们守卫基耐森林的时候，那一份感动连同我的荣誉感一起重生。

String.Source: Still living in the past, I see.
String.Dest: 仍然活在过去，我看到了。

String.Source: On the contrary, I feel like I can be nostalgic because I no longer feel regret.
String.Dest: 但另一方面，既然我不再后悔了，我又开始有点想家了。

String.Source: Then you've moved forward. The past is nostalgic because it can never return.
String.Dest: 因此你必须向前迈进。“过去”之所以让人怀念就是因为它永不重来。

String.Source: You may be right. The White Rose is but a memory, but its seed has blossomed into something new.
String.Dest: 你可能是对的。白色玫瑰成为了回忆，但它的种子已经在新的地方开花结果。

String.Source: When I was in Cyrodiil, I used to come to the Chapel of Arkay every morning and listen to the hymns.
String.Dest: 我在赛洛帝尔的时候，曾每天早晨都去阿尔凯的圣堂聆听他的赞美诗。

String.Source: Except right now, I feel neither resolve nor aspiration. I feel nostalgic.
String.Dest: 但现在，我既没有感受到雄心也没有感受到壮志，有的只是怀旧的寂寞。

String.Source: To think it took all my strength to shoulder such a burden, when for her it seems weightless.
String.Dest: 我想我花了所有的力气去扛起这样重的包袱，换了她却好像一点都不沉 。

String.Source: Viola dislikes Dark Elves, but thanks to Alassea's persistence, she tolerates my presence. Still, we should do our best to remain discrete.
String.Dest: 维欧拉不喜欢暗精灵，但感谢艾拉希的坚持，她容忍了我的存在。但我们还是应当尽我们所能互相保持距离。

String.Source: Now, as far as the broker is concerned, I've thought of a way we can discover who he is without resorting to theft or violence.
String.Dest: 目前，就中间人已介入的情况来看，我想到了一个不用诉诸偷盗或者暴力手段我们就能找出那个家伙的办法。

String.Source: Here. This is a correspondence between our broker and Maven Black-Briar.
String.Dest: 这里，这有一封黑荆棘马雯和我们中间人的来信。

String.Source: It mentions dates and other information that will rule out some of the attendees as suspects, while casting suspicion on others.
String.Dest: 这里提及的日期和其它信息可以帮助我们排除一些会面者的嫌疑，从而将注意力集中到其他人身上。

String.Source: However, it seems your involvement goes deeper than just the broker.
String.Dest: 无论如何，你牵扯进来似乎远远不止一个中间人的身份。

String.Source: It'll just be a moment. I'll find you when I'm done.
String.Dest: 不会花太多时间的。等我搞定之后我会去找你。

String.Source: Bettany is the one we're looking for.
String.Dest: 比坦妮就是我们要找的人。

String.Source: I understand she spends a lot of time in Riften. She could indeed be our broker.
String.Dest: 我明白她在裂谷的阅历很深，所以我们的中间人她当之无愧。

String.Source: Bettany is the one we're looking for.
String.Dest: 比坦妮就是我们要找的人。

String.Source: I'll speak to the steward and see if I can learn more. Given my history, I'm a bit tentative about making any accusations until we're sure.
String.Dest: 我会询问管家，看看能不能问出些别的。以我的经验来看，在有十足把握之前还是不要轻易指控为好。

String.Source: Bettany is the one we're looking for.
String.Dest: 比坦妮就是我们要找的人。

String.Source: In the meantime, I'd like you to follow her once the party's concluded. We can meet back at the Cornerclub when we're finished.
String.Dest: 与此同时，等这场聚会结束的了，我希望你能跟着他。等我们完事儿了，可以回新格尼西斯街角吧碰面。

String.Source: Grenier is the broker.
String.Dest: 格雷尼尔是中间人。

String.Source: The adviser is as slippery as he is educated. He definitely fits the profile.
String.Dest: 那个顾问就如他一直被教导的一样油滑。毫无疑问他的形象很合适他。

String.Source: Grenier is the broker.
String.Dest: 格雷尼尔是中间人。

String.Source: I'll speak to the steward and see if I can learn more. Given my history, I'm a bit tentative about making any accusations until we're sure.
String.Dest: 我会询问管家，看看能不能问出些别的。以我的经验来看，在有十足把握之前还是不要轻易指控为好。

String.Source: Grenier is the broker.
String.Dest: 格雷尼尔是中间人。

String.Source: In the meantime, I'd like you to follow him once the party's concluded. We can meet back at the Cornerclub when we're finished.
String.Dest: 与此同时，等这场聚会结束的了，我希望你能跟着他。等我们完事儿了，可以回新格尼西斯街角吧碰面。

String.Source: Roggstad, the mill owner.
String.Dest: 罗格斯德，那个农场主。

String.Source: The mill owner certainly has the finances to make it work, and that fact that he inherited the gold means he may not have much stake in the business.
String.Dest: 那个农场主当然有资金让它运作起来，而且事实上他的财产来自于继承意味着他可以不用被套牢在这生意里。

String.Source: Roggstad, the mill owner.
String.Dest: 罗格斯德，那个农场主。

String.Source: I'll speak to the steward and see if I can learn more. Given my history, I'm a bit tentative about making any accusations until we're sure.
String.Dest: 我会询问管家，看看能不能问出些别的。以我的经验来看，在有十足把握之前还是不要轻易指控为好。

String.Source: Roggstad, the mill owner.
String.Dest: 罗格斯德，那个农场主。

String.Source: In the meantime, I'd like you to follow him once the party's concluded. We can meet back at the Cornerclub when we're finished.
String.Dest: 与此同时，等这场聚会结束的了，我希望你能跟着他。等我们完事儿了，可以回新格尼西斯街角吧碰面。

String.Source: I think I know who are broker is.
String.Dest: 我想我知道那个在中间牵线搭桥的家伙是谁了。

String.Source: Good work. Who do you suspect?
String.Dest: 干得好。你觉得谁嫌疑最大？

String.Source: Anything that involves Maven can't be good.
String.Dest: 任何牵涉到玛雯的都不是啥好事儿。

String.Source: Yes, her reputation precedes itself. Supposedly, she was growing frustrated over the inefficacy of the black sacrament.
String.Dest: 是的，她的名声夸大其词了。大概她正为黑暗圣礼没有发挥作用而越来越感到挫败。

String.Source: Anything that involves Maven can't be good.
String.Dest: 任何牵涉到玛雯的都不是啥好事儿。

String.Source: The merchant lord offered a solution. He effectively put a bounty on the target and spread word through some of the more corrupt areas of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 商会会长给了个办法。他很有效率地给那目标设了悬赏然后把这个消息散布到了天际所有肮脏的角落。

String.Source: Krillo in Markarth told me to seek you out.
String.Dest: 奎依罗在马卡斯城告诉我，要找你出来。

String.Source: Yes, it seems many of the more corrupt lords in this realm have grown frustrated with the black sacrament.
String.Dest: 嗯，看来这个王国里很多更腐败的领主已经对黑暗圣礼感到失望了。

String.Source: Krillo in Markarth told me to seek you out.
String.Dest: 奎依罗在马卡斯城告诉我，要找你出来。

String.Source: They've started hiring independent contractors. And whenever the demand for something rises, there has to be a way to connect it with a supply.
String.Dest: 他们开始聘请独立的承包商。 并且无论何时需求上升，都一定有办法持续供应补给。

String.Source: Krillo in Markarth told me to seek you out.
String.Dest: 奎依罗在马卡斯城告诉我，要找你出来。

String.Source: In this case, it's taken the form of a powerful broker, one who collects and distributes bounties on behalf of the lords.
String.Dest: 在这桩事情上，它采取了一种权力经纪人的模式，一个代表着贵族收集并分发赏金的中间人。

String.Source: I miss the Knight of Thorns.
String.Dest: 我想念荆棘骑士。

String.Source: The mercenaries didn't feel the same. They drew their weapons, but the old man walked over, put his arm around me and poured his flagon on our heads.
String.Dest: 雇佣兵们并不这么想。他们拔出了武器，但是那个老头很轻松的就走过了他们然后一把搂住我把酒壶倒在了了我们的头上。

String.Source: He laughed, and everyone joined him. Then he bought us all a round.
String.Dest: 他大笑了起来，其他人也跟着笑了。然后他请我们所有人都喝了一杯。

String.Source: I miss the Knight of Thorns.
String.Dest: 我想念荆棘骑士。

String.Source: I thanked him later for saving me from the mercenaries. That's when he told me, "I saved you from yourself."
String.Dest: 后来我去感谢他将我从那帮佣兵手里救出。那时他却对我说：‘其实我只是把你从你自己手里救了出来“。

String.Source: I miss the Knight of Thorns.
String.Dest: 我想念荆棘骑士。

String.Source: I'd like to say I'm doing this as a favor to him, but perhaps I'm wrong in this regard as well.
String.Dest: 我想说我这么做只是为了帮他一个忙。不过我表达敬意的方式好像错了。

String.Source: I miss the Knight of Thorns.
String.Dest: 我想念荆棘骑士。

String.Source: The mercenaries drew their swords. But then the old man walked over, put his arm around my shoulder and proceeded to drench the both of us in ale.
String.Dest: 佣兵们拔剑出鞘。可就在那时，那个老人走上前来，一手搭上我的肩膀，用麦芽酒把我和他自己浇成了落汤鸡。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: He laughed, and everyone joined him. Then he bought us all a round.
String.Dest: 他大笑了起来，其他人也跟着笑了。然后他请我们所有人都喝了一杯。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: I thanked him later for saving me from the mercenaries. That's when he told me, "I saved you from yourself."
String.Dest: 后来我去感谢他将我从那帮佣兵手里救出。那时他却对我说：‘其实我只是把你从你自己手里救了出来“。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: I'd like to say I'm doing this as a favor to him, but perhaps I'm wrong in this regard as well.
String.Dest: 我想说我这么做只是为了帮他一个忙。不过我表达敬意的方式好像错了。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: The old man didn't tell you, did he? It was back when I was in Kynesgrove, trying to live up to the name the Knight of Thorns.
String.Dest: 那个老人没有告诉你，是么？从前我还住在基奈林的时候，曾经努力地想要成为荆棘骑士。

String.Source: Why are you investigating the Darksteel murders?
String.Dest: 你为什么要调查黑铁谋杀案？

String.Source: As I was wont to do, I got into an argument with a band of sellswords. I poured beer over the head of the leader, all but daring him to kill me.
String.Dest: 正如我习惯的那样，我和一群佣兵起了争执。我把啤酒倒在了头目的脑袋上，只道他也不敢杀我。

String.Source: Why are you investigating the Darksteel murders?
String.Dest: 你为什么要调查黑铁谋杀案？

String.Source: If I were to play the role once more, I could be an asset, but I vowed to never be anyone but myself.
String.Dest: 如果再次扮演那一角色的话，我肯定会干的很好， 但我发誓只做我自己。

String.Source: I think this situation calls for the Knight of Thorns.
String.Dest: 我想这样的地位通常叫做荆棘骑士。

String.Source: We had the authority of the Count and the Countess. There was no need for subterfuge.
String.Dest: 我们可是代行伯爵和伯爵夫人的权力，根本不需要耍花招。

String.Source: Is espionage a tactic you learned in the Order of the Rose?
String.Dest: 特务活动这种战术你是在玫瑰教团那边学到的吗？

String.Source: As common citizens, we can't simply barge into someone's residence and demand they turn over evidence.
String.Dest: 作为普通民众，我们不能简单粗暴地强闯民宅，然后要求他们交出证据。

String.Source: Is espionage a tactic you learned in the Order of the Rose?
String.Dest: 特务活动这种战术你是在玫瑰教团那边学到的吗？

String.Source: You're also a strong presence. It could serve as a diversion if necessary.
String.Dest: 你也是个一个强大的存在。如果必要时还能消遣消遣。

String.Source: Then why are you asking me? I'm as subtle as a beehive.
String.Dest: 那你问我做什么？我可是比蜂箱还要渺小。

String.Source: Good. We do not want to cause a disruption, given the circumstances. We just need to gather evidence.
String.Dest: 很好，这种情况下谁都不想制造混乱。我们需要做的只是收集证据。

String.Source: Discretion is one of my strengths.
String.Dest: 我的能力之一就是谨慎。

String.Source: Your timing is quite auspicious. There is a gathering tonight at Viola Giordano's estate. Rumor has it that our broker will be in attendance.
String.Dest: 你来的正是时候。今晚在维欧拉·乔尔丹诺的家中有一场聚会。有传言说我们的中间人也将出席。

String.Source: What can I do to help?
String.Dest: 我能帮些什么忙？

String.Source: This may be our chance to discover his identity, but it calls for a more subtle approach than brandishing one's sword.
String.Dest: 这或许正是一个找出他本尊的好机会，可比不得耍剑，这种事情需要更微妙的手段。

String.Source: What can I do to help?
String.Dest: 我能帮些什么忙？

String.Source: Be sure to study the missive. Hopefully between the two of us we'll be able to sort out who the broker is.
String.Dest: 好好研究下公文。希望在我们两人之中有人能区分出谁是代理人。

String.Source: Very well. I'll meet you at Viola Giordano's house then.
String.Dest: 很好。那么维欧拉·乔尔丹诺家再会。

String.Source: See the girl by the altar? In the past year she's lost a brother in the war, a cousin to illness, and her grandfather to time.
String.Dest: 看到在祭坛边的那个女孩子了吗？在过去的一年中，她失去了三个至亲。她的兄弟死于战火，她的表亲死于疾病，而她的祖父死于无情的时间。

String.Source: She seems frail. Powerless. And yet, she continues to move forward her life, while promising never to forget the ones that she left behind.
String.Dest: 她看上去十分软弱无力。可是，她仍然努力面对生活，同时发誓永远不会忘记那些死去的人。

String.Source: You're right. Let's find a table before anyone else notices.
String.Dest: 你说得对。让我们在有人发现之前坐下来吧。

String.Source: Hold off your admiration for now and try to blend in. We don't want to look out of place.
String.Dest: 现在先别急着拍马屁，试试看融入进去。我们可不想看起来格格不入。

String.Source: The madness of Sheogorath rarely has a point, my lady.
String.Dest: 疯神希奥格拉丝发疯是不需要理由的，我的女士。

String.Source: Not all of them, my lady.
String.Dest: 不全是，夫人。

String.Source: It seems the sword's magical energy was enough to draw a number of suitors.
String.Dest: 看了这把剑的魔法能量已经够来"招蜂引蝶"了。

String.Source: In any case, we should head over to Liar's Retreat. Hopefully the bandits haven't discovered the blade themselves.
String.Dest: 任何情况下，我们都要去说谎者藏身处。最好那伙强盗还没能找到那把刀。

String.Source: My lady, I believe I am smart enough to know not to answer that question.
String.Dest: 夫人, 我还没有笨到会去回答这个问题.

String.Source: It's unlikely, but I wouldn't rule it out. Grenier was a smart man, and a smart man knows the weaknesses of his business partners.
String.Dest: 这种可能性不高，但是还不能排除它。格雷尼尔是个聪明人，而一个聪明人会对他的生意伙伴的弱点了如指掌。

String.Source: After all, it's not uncommon for those partnerships to sour.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，那种合作关系最终变质可也没什么可奇怪的。

String.Source: Liar's shame...this may be a shot in the dark, but when I was talking to the steward about the broker, he did mention something interesting.
String.Dest: 说谎者之羞……这可能是瞎猜而已，但我和管家提起那个中间商的时候，他确实说了些有意思的事情。

String.Source: Apparently there were rumors that black market bounties were being posted in a bandit tavern called Liar's Retreat.
String.Dest: 显然，有传言说黑市的悬赏令被贴在了一个叫做骗子老巢的土匪窝儿里。

String.Source: Oh? And why do you think that is?
String.Dest: 哦？那你这样想的理由又是什么？

String.Source: That is a vice I know all too well.
String.Dest: 那是一个我再了解不过的恶行了。

String.Source: Generally speaking, but it's not true in all cases. For some, the allure of gold is more desirable than any lover.
String.Dest: 一般来讲，这种事情都不是真的。对某些人来说，金钱的诱惑力要比任何情欲更加有说服力。

String.Source: It is a vow we all took, my lady, to show our commitment to purity. But in practical terms it also served a purpose.
String.Dest: 夫人，我们都立过同样的誓，以此宣明我们献身于纯净。但事实上这一点用都没有。

String.Source: If one had the discipline to avoid the pleasures of the flesh, he could resist any and all forms of corruption.
String.Dest: 如果一个人能自律到不沉溺于肉体上的享乐，那他就能抗拒任何形式的堕落。

String.Source: I'm not as familiar with Nord music as you are, my lady. How does that go?
String.Dest: 我对诺德音乐没有你那么熟悉，女士。这曲子怎么样？

String.Source: There are many I'm fond of.
String.Dest: 这里有许多我中意的。

String.Source: (Sigh) All right, but make sure you stay out of harm's way.
String.Dest: (叹气)好吧，但要保证你自己的安全。

String.Source: Alassea, my dear, while your company is welcome, I assure you the Dragonborn and I can handle this.
String.Dest: 我亲爱的艾拉希，只要你的同伴没问题，我向你保证抓根宝和我可以处理好这一切。

String.Source: That may not be the wisest course of action. Believe me when I say, there are two truths to every story.
String.Dest: 那可能不是最明智的做法。相信我，每个故事的真相都有两个版本。

String.Source: I apologize for not arriving sooner. It appears getting an audience with the Steward is far more difficult when you're a Dunmer.
String.Dest: 来晚了，我很抱歉。作为一个暗精灵，要想弄到一个有管家的听众【领主？】显然要困难得多。

String.Source: Until then, my lady.
String.Dest: 在此之前，夫人.

String.Source: Alassea. Any man who finds your voice displeasing has not the faculties to listen.
String.Dest: 艾拉希。觉得你声音不好听的家伙是他自己耳朵有问题。

String.Source: An accomplished warrior, my lady. I was just about to inquire whether he would attend the party as well.
String.Dest: 一个有修养的战士，我的夫人。我只是想打听一下他是否也会参加这次聚会。

String.Source: An accomplished warrior, my lady. I was just about to inquire whether she would attend the party as well.
String.Dest: 一位训练有素的勇士，夫人。我只是想打听一下他是否也会参加这次聚会。

String.Source: Of course, my lady. It would be rude of me not to.
String.Dest: 当然，夫人。如果我拒绝的话那就太无礼了。

String.Source: I wasn't alone. Hearing that chorus of children gave people the resolve they needed to face the day.
String.Dest: 我并不孤单。孩子们的合唱赋予了人们面对现实的勇气。

String.Source: But for me, it gave me something else. It gave me something to aspire to.
String.Dest: 但对我而言，它给了我别的东西。它给了我目标。

String.Source: Shouldn't you have defiled her first? And I thought you said she survived.
String.Dest: 你不是该占有她的第一次吗？我以为你说她存活下来了。

String.Source: Don't tell me how to play the villain! I am the Knight of Thorns! I invented treachery!
String.Dest: 不用告诉我怎么演反派！我可是荆棘骑士！背叛的注脚上写着我的名字！

String.Source: Shouldn't you have defiled her first? And I thought you said she survived.
String.Dest: 你不是该占有她的第一次吗？我以为你说她存活下来了。

String.Source: And maybe I exaggerated a few of the details, but what do you expect from a proven liar.
String.Dest: 虽然我可能夸张了其中的一些细节，但从一个公认的骗子口中，你还能期望些什么呢？

String.Source: Who were you before you became the Knight of Thorns?
String.Dest: 在成为荆棘骑士之前，你是谁？?

String.Source: Hmph. Some called me the White Rose. A paladin in pure white armor, said to be painted by a soul that was the very same.
String.Dest: 哈。有些人叫我白玫瑰，一个穿着纯白装甲的圣骑士。人们说这白色由我同样洁白的灵魂染就。

String.Source: Who were you before you became the Knight of Thorns?
String.Dest: 在成为荆棘骑士之前，你是谁？?

String.Source: Ha! I deceived all of Cyrodiil with my feats of valor. The liberation of Fort Farragut, the vanquishing of the Warlocks of Quickwater Cave...
String.Dest: 哈！我用我英勇的功绩欺骗了所有赛瑞迪尔的人。解放Fort Farragut，战胜Quickwater Cave里的术士……

String.Source: Who were you before you became the Knight of Thorns?
String.Dest: 在成为荆棘骑士之前，你是谁？?

String.Source: All a ruse, an unctuous gambit to earn the trust of the fair Countess. Then without cause, motive, or provocation, I stabbed her in the chest!
String.Dest: 所有的一切都是个诡计，一个赢得美丽的伯爵夫人信任的虚与委蛇的花招儿。然后，毫无原因、动机、理由地，我刺伤了她的胸膛！

String.Source: Who were you before you became the Knight of Thorns?
String.Dest: 在成为荆棘骑士之前，你是谁？?

String.Source: Thank the Divines the Steward was there to witness the entire deed, and to provide the Countess with the health potion that saved her life.
String.Dest: 感谢圣灵，管家目击了这一切，正是他给了伯爵夫人一瓶生命药剂，最终救了她的命。

String.Source: Who were you before you became the Knight of Thorns?
String.Dest: 在成为荆棘骑士之前，你是谁？?

String.Source: Of course, he never saw my face, but there was no mistaking my armor. And no mistaking the petals of blood that stained its chest plate.
String.Dest: 当然，他看不见我的脸，但肯定不会认错我的铠甲，更不会认错那沾染在护胸上的斑斑血迹。

String.Source: Who were you before you became the Knight of Thorns?
String.Dest: 在成为荆棘骑士之前，你是谁？?

String.Source: So it was obviously I who, jealous over her love of the Count, clumsily stabbed the woman I was sworn to protect.
String.Dest: 显然的我就是这么一个人，我嫉妒于她对伯爵的爱，我可耻地伤害了那个我发誓要保护的女人。

String.Source: You may still have a chance for redemption.
String.Dest: 亡羊补牢为时未晚。

String.Source: Redemption? Are you mad? I am the Knight of Thorns! I nearly murdered a Countess! Washing that stain is not as simple as killing a few bandits.
String.Dest: 救赎？你疯了吗？我可是荆棘骑士！我差点儿就杀了伯爵夫人！想洗净这些污秽可不是简简单单杀死几个强盗就可以的。

String.Source: You may still have a chance for redemption.
String.Dest: 亡羊补牢为时未晚。

String.Source: And if I am not corrupt, that would mean that my brothers and sisters sent an innocent knight to death. That is preposterous.
String.Dest: 若不是我阻止，我的兄弟和姐妹们或许已经把一个无辜的骑士送上绝路了。这可真荒谬。

String.Source: You may still have a chance for redemption.
String.Dest: 亡羊补牢为时未晚。

String.Source: For as you can clearly see, I am a boorish fool who will cover your face in spittle, and your tunic in blood.
String.Dest: 因为你可以看个清楚，我就是个会朝你脸上啐唾沫星子，让你的外衣染上鲜血的呆瓜乡巴佬。

String.Source: If you committed such a crime, how is it you still live?
String.Dest: 如果你认了这个罪，那你怎么还活着？

String.Source: Pity. Incompetence. I should have been tortured, dismembered, and then paraded around the city on a spike.
String.Dest: 同情，或者有人没有尽职尽责，谁知道呢。我原本应该被折磨，被肢解，然后被穿在钉子上在城里游行示众。

String.Source: If you committed such a crime, how is it you still live?
String.Dest: 如果你认了这个罪，那你怎么还活着？

String.Source: But the court chose exile. Something about my years of service, and the countless heroic deeds I did on behalf of the kingdom.
String.Dest: 我这些年的付出，还有为了保卫王国而做出的数不清的英勇行为，就因为这样的理由，宫廷只选择了将我放逐。

String.Source: If you committed such a crime, how is it you still live?
String.Dest: 如果你认了这个罪，那你怎么还活着？

String.Source: Bah! I should have died a traitor's death. So I will have to instead settle for an ignoble life, and wear my crown of thorns.
String.Dest: 呸！我本该像一个叛徒一样死掉。就因为没有在那时死去，我不得不过着这样卑贱的生活，并背负着罪孽的荆棘之冠。

String.Source: You are making a scene. I wish to join you.
String.Dest: 你在做大事。我想加入你。

String.Source: Sorry traveler, but this scene's for only the worst kind of knave. Brigands. Sellswords. Knights without dignity or honor.
String.Dest: 不好意思，旅行者，这个场景只给最差劲的流氓看的，比如土匪，雇佣兵还有毫无尊严和荣誉的骑士。

String.Source: You are making a scene. I wish to join you.
String.Dest: 你在做大事。我想加入你。

String.Source: Did you know that the Countess of Cheydinhal was nearly assassinated by someone in her own circle? Her most trusted knight?
String.Dest: 你知道夏丁赫尔的伯爵夫人差一点儿就被某个她生活圈子里的人暗杀成功了吗？你知道那个人正是她最信赖的骑士吗？

String.Source: You are making a scene. I wish to join you.
String.Dest: 你在做大事。我想加入你。

String.Source: They say she kept him by her side at all times, like a lady clutches a rose.
String.Dest: 他们说她一直把他留在身边，就像女士握着一朵玫瑰那样。

String.Source: You are making a scene. I wish to join you.
String.Dest: 你在做大事。我想加入你。

String.Source: That is, until the knight revealed himself as turncoat, and pricked her palms with his steel.
String.Dest: 那就是，当骑士终于露出了叛徒的真面目，用他的利剑刺穿她的手掌。

String.Source: Good sir, there's no need to hide your anguish behind a veil of sarcasm.
String.Dest: 尊敬的先生，没有必要在自嘲的面纱下隐藏自己的痛苦。

String.Source: (Sigh) You sound like someone I once knew. He walked the path of righteousness, and lived only to serve with honor.
String.Dest: （叹气）你听起来就像我以前认识的某人一样。他沿着正义的道路前进，只为荣誉而活。

String.Source: Good sir, there's no need to hide your anguish behind a veil of sarcasm.
String.Dest: 尊敬的先生，没有必要在自嘲的面纱下隐藏自己的痛苦。

String.Source: For the integrity of the court, the Count and the Countess, he played the role that has been cast. For their sake he let the lie become truth.
String.Dest: 为了宫廷的完整性，为了伯爵和伯爵夫人,他扮演着虚构的角色。为了他们，他让谎言变成真实。

String.Source: Good sir, there's no need to hide your anguish behind a veil of sarcasm.
String.Dest: 尊敬的先生，没有必要在自嘲的面纱下隐藏自己的痛苦。

String.Source: He believed that to live in dishonor is the only honorable path he had left.
String.Dest: 他觉得忍辱负重苟且偷生是他剩下的唯一一条还能算荣誉的路了。

String.Source: Good sir, there's no need to hide your anguish behind a veil of sarcasm.
String.Dest: 尊敬的先生，没有必要在自嘲的面纱下隐藏自己的痛苦。

String.Source: And when he died, perhaps the Gods would exonerate him, and let him walk once more amongst the roses.
String.Dest: 当他死去之后，或许众神能赦免他的罪，让他再次行走于玫瑰之中。

String.Source: Ogre bait. A fine way to die.
String.Dest: 做食人魔的口粮，不错的死法。

String.Source: Yes, a fitting end for a gutless turncoat like myself. Helplessly squirming in the bowels of some mammoth beast.
String.Dest: 是啊，这真是一个合适像我这样的叛徒的结局——在猛犸的肠子里无助地蠕动。

String.Source: Ogre bait. A fine way to die.
String.Dest: 做食人魔的口粮，不错的死法。

String.Source: But my executioner failed to comply. It seemed even the ogres found my duplicity in poor taste.
String.Dest: 可我的刽子手没能执行命令。好像就连巨魔都会因为我的表里不一而失了胃口。

String.Source: They left you for dead.
String.Dest: 他们弃置你于死地而不顾。

String.Source: Hmph. I laid in that fallow pit for an entire night, waiting for my death. Welcoming it.
String.Dest: 哼嗯。我一整晚都躺在那个土坑里，等待我的死亡，准备张开双臂迎接它。

String.Source: They left you for dead.
String.Dest: 他们弃置你于死地而不顾。

String.Source: Then, as the hour grew darkest, I thought the snow had finally begun to recede.
String.Dest: 然后，随着天色渐暗，我感觉大雪终于开始消退。

String.Source: They left you for dead.
String.Dest: 他们弃置你于死地而不顾。

String.Source: Only when I looked up, I found it had gathered on the back of the biggest, ugliest ogre I had ever seen.
String.Dest: 只是当我抬起头时，我看见它聚集在一只我所见过最大最丑的巨魔背上。

String.Source: I assume you could have gone anywhere outside of Cyrodiil. Why Skyrim?
String.Dest: 在赛洛迪尔之外有很多地方可以去，为什么你偏要来天际？

String.Source: Why indeed. Why not my ancestral home of Morrowind, the land which the Countess herself assured I would be escorted to.
String.Dest: 这到底是为什么，明明伯爵夫人给与了我承诺，为什么我并没有被护送到我在晨风中的祖地？

String.Source: I assume you could have gone anywhere outside of Cyrodiil. Why Skyrim?
String.Dest: 在赛洛迪尔之外有很多地方可以去，为什么你偏要来天际？

String.Source: It was no doubt a mistake that I found myself being marched up the face of the Jerall Mountains, blades of snow slicing against my brow.
String.Dest: 这无疑是一个错误，当我发现自己正走在杰哈尔山脉的对面，锐利的雪花一片片削过我的额头。

String.Source: I assume you could have gone anywhere outside of Cyrodiil. Why Skyrim?
String.Dest: 在赛洛迪尔之外有很多地方可以去，为什么你偏要来天际？

String.Source: Pure accident that my brothers and sisters, members of the Order of the Rose, ushered me down an unmarked road and tossed me into a tiny alcove.
String.Dest: 我的玫瑰教团的兄弟姐妹们把我领入一条不知名的小路，而后将我扔进一个小壁厢里是个纯粹的意外。

String.Source: I assume you could have gone anywhere outside of Cyrodiil. Why Skyrim?
String.Dest: 在赛洛迪尔之外有很多地方可以去，为什么你偏要来天际？

String.Source: I remember chipping a tooth when I hit the ground. The dirt was frozen solid, so hard that even the wormwood refused to grow.
String.Dest: 我记得我撞到地上时磕碎了牙。满嘴都是又脏又冷的泥土，硬得连蒿草都钻不出。

String.Source: I assume you could have gone anywhere outside of Cyrodiil. Why Skyrim?
String.Dest: 在赛洛迪尔之外有很多地方可以去，为什么你偏要来天际？

String.Source: Yet what it lacked in flora, it made up for in bones. It was an Ogre's hunting grounds, and my grave.
String.Dest: 尽管这儿没什么植物，骸骨倒遍地都是。这里曾经是一处巨魔的狩猎场，也是我的坟墓。

String.Source: Right. You want me to return to Cyrodiil, embarrass the court and the Order, and risk my own execution?
String.Dest: 好得很。你这是让我冒着被送上刑场砍头的风险，只为了让我回赛瑞迪尔给宫廷和教团些难堪？

String.Source: The real assailant is still out there. You ought to be plotting your revenge.
String.Dest: 真正的攻击者仍在外逍遥。你应该立马策划复仇行动。

String.Source: Well, on the one hand, there's a chance I may reclaim my honor. On the other hand, I am tired and would rather suckle on this flagon of mead.
String.Dest: 嗯，一方面，我确实有机会重拾我的荣耀。另一方面，我已经很累了，更愿意呆在这里啜饮几口蜜酒。

String.Source: The real assailant is still out there. You ought to be plotting your revenge.
String.Dest: 真正的攻击者仍在外逍遥。你应该立马策划复仇行动。

String.Source: (Drinks)
The real assailant is still out there. You ought to be plotting your revenge.
String.Dest: 真正的攻击者仍在外逍遥。你应该立马策划复仇行动。

String.Source: Yes, you and the Countess, and all who knew me as the White Rose. They called me polite. Gentle. Well-mannered.
String.Dest: 是的，你还有伯爵夫人，再加上所有认识作为白玫瑰的我的人。他们都说我文雅，温和，有教养。

String.Source: I find it odd that such a knight would attempt to murder his Countess.
String.Dest: 我很奇怪这样的一个骑士居然会试图去谋杀他的夫人。

String.Source: As you can see, that couldn't be further from the truth! I am a boorish drunk, a scoundrel, and a lecher.
String.Dest: 如您所见，这是一个不可否认的事实。我就是一个乡下酒鬼，一个恶棍，一个色魔。

String.Source: I find it odd that such a knight would attempt to murder his Countess.
String.Dest: 我很奇怪这样的一个骑士居然会试图去谋杀他的夫人。

String.Source: (Drinks)
I find it odd that such a knight would attempt to murder his Countess.
String.Dest: 我很奇怪这样的一个骑士居然会试图去谋杀他的夫人。

String.Source: With three beers down the Orc did frown and bid the Elf goodbye! For none could know t'was not for show and someone had to die!
String.Dest: 三杯啤酒穿肠走，兽人精灵要分手。这不是次表演秀，而是某人要死咯。

String.Source: What do you want? Come to gawk at the Knight of Thorns! Well here I am, for your viewing pleasure!
String.Dest: 你想要什么？就为了傻站着看着荆棘骑士吗！那好，我就在这儿，你尽管看个够吧！

String.Source: Roses or Thorns, you don't seem like one ready to admit guilt.
String.Dest: 称心如意或是难受至极，你看上去不像是要认罪的样子。

String.Source: (Sigh) You sound like the Countess. She would not accept that I was her assailant. Yet the evidence says otherwise.
String.Dest: （叹气）你说话就像伯爵夫人。她不会相信我就是刺杀她的人，即使证据确凿。

String.Source: Roses or Thorns, you don't seem like one ready to admit guilt.
String.Dest: 称心如意或是难受至极，你看上去不像是要认罪的样子。

String.Source: Yet for the integrity of the court, the Count and the Countess, I play the role that has been cast. I play the traitor, and the drunk.
String.Dest: 但是为了宫廷的完整，为了伯爵和伯爵夫人，我要扮演着虚构的角色。我假扮成一个叛徒，一个酒鬼。

String.Source: Roses or Thorns, you don't seem like one ready to admit guilt.
String.Dest: 称心如意或是难受至极，你看上去不像是要认罪的样子。

String.Source: But your insinuations raise an interesting point.
String.Dest: 但你绕着圈子说出了个挺有趣的观点。

String.Source: Roses or Thorns, you don't seem like one ready to admit guilt.
String.Dest: 称心如意或是难受至极，你看上去不像是要认罪的样子。

String.Source: Why, perhaps I have been going about this all wrong. I should be embracing who I am, and not the monster I have been branded as.
String.Dest: 为什么？也许我从头到尾都是错的呢？也许我应该拥抱自己的本真，而不是扮作别人定义的怪物。

String.Source: I wouldn't lose any sleep over it. Trust me, we've all been there.
String.Dest: 我不会为了这个浪费任何睡眠，相信我，我们都曾经在那里。

String.Source: Who said I was losing any sleep? Yes, I may look a bit weary, but who are you going to believe, me or your own eyes?
String.Dest: 谁说我失眠了？是，我确实看起来有点疲倦，但你打算相信什么？我的话，还是你的眼睛？

String.Source: I wouldn't lose any sleep over it. Trust me, we've all been there.
String.Dest: 我不会为了这个浪费任何睡眠，相信我，我们都曾经在那里。

String.Source: And be careful how you answer that. The Knight of Thorns has been known to slay anyone who disagrees with him.
String.Dest: 回答要小心点儿。荆棘骑士可是会杀死每一个不同意他的人的。

String.Source: Look at you, drooling like a drunken fool. Where's your dignity, knight?
String.Dest: 瞧瞧你，痴呆得像个喝醉的傻瓜。你的尊严哪儿去了，骑士。

String.Source: Where's my dignity? Why it's in Cyrodiil, where I left it, in the blood-stained robe of the Countess of Cheydinhal.
String.Dest: 我的尊严在哪儿？为何会在赛洛迪尔？我就是在那里失去了它的，它被夏丁赫尔伯爵夫人长袍上沾染的鲜血冲走了。

String.Source: Look at you, drooling like a drunken fool. Where's your dignity, knight?
String.Dest: 瞧瞧你，痴呆得像个喝醉的傻瓜。你的尊严哪儿去了，骑士。

String.Source: The same Countess who held me close to her side like a maiden clutches a rose.
String.Dest: 这位伯爵夫人就是那位留我在她身边，像少女对待玫瑰那样的女士。

String.Source: Look at you, drooling like a drunken fool. Where's your dignity, knight?
String.Dest: 瞧瞧你，痴呆得像个喝醉的傻瓜。你的尊严哪儿去了，骑士。

String.Source: I am that most unworthy of fiends, you see. A liar. A betrayer. A turncoat.
String.Dest: 我是最卑劣的魔鬼，你瞧，我是一个骗子，一个叛徒，一个变节者。

String.Source: That was an excellent deception. Too bad you botched the murder.
String.Dest: 那是个优秀的骗局。可天杀的你笨手笨脚的搞砸了那次谋杀。

String.Source: You think too highly of me. After all, what did you expect from a knight who didn't even bother to wipe the blood stain from his armor?
String.Dest: 你把我想的太好了。不论如何，你认为一个甚至从不操心将血污从铠甲上擦掉的骑士还能有值得期待的？

String.Source: That was an excellent deception. Too bad you botched the murder.
String.Dest: 那是个优秀的骗局。可天杀的你笨手笨脚的搞砸了那次谋杀。

String.Source: No, he just returned to his bed chamber and placed his blood-stained sword and armor conveniently beside him as he bid the night farewell.
String.Dest: 不，他仅仅只是回到卧室，把染血的剑和盔甲随便扔在床脚，同时道了个晚安。

String.Source: Why yes, as a matter of fact, I have. Now allow me to gawk in peace.
String.Dest: 为什么，事实上我有，现在请允许我和平的呆在这。

String.Source: Then shut that Kwama you call a mouth and gawk like a proper onlooker. Furrow your brow, sneer your lips and shake your head in shame!
String.Dest: 管住那条你叫做“嘴”的阿玛虫（源自晨风的一种虫怪），做个称职的旁观者，在一旁傻呆呆的看着就好了。你只要皱皱眉毛，面露讥笑，或者羞愧的摇摇头！

String.Source: Why yes, as a matter of fact, I have. Now allow me to gawk in peace.
String.Dest: 为什么，事实上我有，现在请允许我和平的呆在这。

String.Source: For I was once a heralded knight, a member of the Countess of Cheydinhal's inner circle, one she kept by her side like a maiden clutching a rose.
String.Dest: 我曾经是一个宣誓的骑士，夏丁赫尔伯爵夫人的核心集团成员之一，我一直在她身边，正如紧紧握在少女手中的玫瑰。

String.Source: Why yes, as a matter of fact, I have. Now allow me to gawk in peace.
String.Dest: 为什么，事实上我有，现在请允许我和平的呆在这。

String.Source: Such was my duplicity that I used that trust against her, and attempted to take her life, to prick her gentle hand with my treacherous thorns.
String.Dest: 我利用了她的信任，试图夺去她的生命，用我那危险的荆棘刺伤她柔软的手，就如同我对她的欺骗一样。

String.Source: Pay me no heed. I'm just passing through.
String.Dest: 别管我，我只是路过。

String.Source: Good, then while you're at it, go fetch me another tankard. This one's only three quarters full. By Azura, I feel practically sober!
String.Dest: 好极了，到时候帮我再拿一杯酒，这一杯只装了四分之三。以阿祖拉之名，我这会儿可是特别的清醒！

String.Source: Pay me no heed. I'm just passing through.
String.Dest: 别管我，我只是路过。

String.Source: Then I'll tell you the story of how I nearly murdered the Countess of Cheydinhal, was exiled from Cyrodiil, and earned the title of a traitorous cur.
String.Dest: 然后我就会告诉你我是怎么差点杀了夏丁赫尔的伯爵夫人，然后被赛洛迪尔流放，最后得到这么一个叛徒名号的故事。

String.Source: No drinking or love? What a preposterous notion of purity.
String.Dest: 不喝酒也不做爱？这种纯洁思想实在是太荒谬了。

String.Source: I agree wholeheartedly. The knights would say a mortal does not need love when he has loyalty, or wine when he has humor.
String.Dest: 我完全同意。骑士们会说一个人有了忠诚就不再需要爱情，或者有了幽默就不再需要酒精。

String.Source: No drinking or love? What a preposterous notion of purity.
String.Dest: 不喝酒也不做爱？这种纯洁思想实在是太荒谬了。

String.Source: Utter foolishness! There is only one thing humorous about the Order of the Rose. Their creed.
String.Dest: 愚蠢至极！ 玫瑰法则中只有一件事很好笑。 那就是他们的信条。

String.Source: No drinking or love? What a preposterous notion of purity.
String.Dest: 不喝酒也不做爱？这种纯洁思想实在是太荒谬了。

String.Source: And the only real loyalty in this world is the contract a pint of mead makes with your stomach. One warm body in exchange for one night of happiness.
String.Dest: 唯有装满蜂蜜酒的肚子才是这个世界上唯一不会说谎的东西。用暖烘烘的身体来交换一个夜晚的快乐吧！

String.Source: No drinking or love? What a preposterous notion of purity.
String.Dest: 不喝酒也不做爱？这种纯洁思想实在是太荒谬了。

String.Source: Or was that the whore's contract? I can't recall which is which.
String.Dest: 或者是失足妇女的卖身契？我记不清哪个是哪个了。

String.Source: No drinking or love? What a preposterous notion of purity.
String.Dest: 不喝酒也不做爱？这种纯洁思想实在是太荒谬了。

String.Source: (Drinks)
They should have at least given you a weapon.
String.Dest: 他们至少也得给你把武器啊。

String.Source: And did the Countess have a weapon when I used her like a scabbard? No, the manner of death they chose for me was appropriate.
String.Dest: 而当我的武器刺入伯爵夫人躯体的时候，她难道不是手无寸铁吗? 不，他们为我选择的死法是合适的。

String.Source: They should have at least given you a weapon.
String.Dest: 他们至少也得给你把武器啊。

String.Source: But the executioner was reluctant. Even the ogre found my mendacity distasteful.
String.Dest: 不过刽子手不是很情愿。即使连巨魔都能觉得我的虚伪令人反胃。

String.Source: I find people who profess their purity to everyone are often hypocrites.
String.Dest: 我发现自喻清高的人往往都是伪君子。

String.Source: Yes, there were always some who doubted my integrity. They couldn't believe I was a gentle, humble knight, who took pride in acting with grace.
String.Dest: 是的，我的正直一直受到怀疑。他们无法相信我曾经是一名文雅谦和的骑士，以优雅的言行而自傲。

String.Source: I find people who profess their purity to everyone are often hypocrites.
String.Dest: 我发现自喻清高的人往往都是伪君子。

String.Source: And they were right! As you can plainly see, I am a rube. A filthy, ill-tempered barbarian, who cares more for liquor than breath!
String.Dest: 而他们是对的！如你所见，我就是个土包子。一个肮脏，暴躁的野人，而且嗜酒如命。

String.Source: I find people who profess their purity to everyone are often hypocrites.
String.Dest: 我发现自喻清高的人往往都是伪君子。

String.Source: (Drinks)
Alright, your act is starting to annoy me. Speak true.
String.Dest: 好吧，你的行为已经让我感到厌烦了，说真的。

String.Source: What are you suggesting? That I am not a traitor? That I am not a drunk? This belly full of mead begs to differ.
String.Dest: 你想说明什么？你想说我不是一个叛徒？你想说我不是一个酒鬼？我这装满蜂蜜酒的肚子可不同意。

String.Source: Alright, your act is starting to annoy me. Speak true.
String.Dest: 好吧，你的行为已经让我感到厌烦了，说真的。

String.Source: I am the Knight of Thorns, and to say otherwise is to defy the Countess of Cheydinhal.
String.Dest: 我是荆棘骑士，也就是那个刺杀夏丁赫尔的伯爵夫人的人。

String.Source: Alright, your act is starting to annoy me. Speak true.
String.Dest: 好吧，你的行为已经让我感到厌烦了，说真的。

String.Source: Yet perhaps that is precisely what a traitor would do. I could embrace my decorated past, and challenge all those who say I am tainted.
String.Dest: 但也许那恰恰是一个叛徒会干的事情。 以我充满荣誉的过去为名，我会和任何说我被污染了的人单挑！

String.Source: So what are you saying, someone stole your armor in order to frame you?
String.Dest: 你到底在说什么，有人偷了你的盔甲是为了陷害你？

String.Source: No, no, that's impossible! Heavy armor is so comfortable to sleep in! At no point would I remove it and allow an enterprising thief to purloin it.
String.Dest: 不，不，那不可能！！睡在重甲里超舒服的！我才不可能把它脱掉然后让一个大胆的小偷把它偷走呢！

String.Source: So what are you saying, someone stole your armor in order to frame you?
String.Dest: 你到底在说什么，有人偷了你的盔甲是为了陷害你？

String.Source: Bah! It matters not. The evidence points to me. There is no other explanation. The Countess chose exile to be my sentence, and so I serve.
String.Dest: 呸！这并不重要！关键是那证据直指于我，我也再拿不出别的解释了。于是伯爵夫人免了我的职，宣布将我放逐。

String.Source: Do you think the Steward had a hand in this plot?
String.Dest: 你认为有多少管事的参与这个阴谋？

String.Source: Of course not! The Steward was a fine Argonian gentleman who despised Dunmer with every fiber of his being.
String.Dest: 当然不是！这个斯图尔德是位优秀的亚龙人绅士。他把自己的每一处细胞都用来藐视黑暗精灵了。

String.Source: Do you think the Steward had a hand in this plot?
String.Dest: 你认为有多少管事的参与这个阴谋？

String.Source: Such a paragon of honor acted only in the best interests of the court. And that underground hist sap operation he was rumored to have funded?
String.Dest: 这堪称模范的荣誉感仅仅在符合宫廷的最佳利益之时才会表现出来，有谁听说过他为埋在地下的希斯特树汁出过一分钱吗？

String.Source: Do you think the Steward had a hand in this plot?
String.Dest: 你认为有多少管事的参与这个阴谋？

String.Source: Lies! Lies perpetrated by the Knight of Thorns. After all, I tried to assassinate the Countess! How in Azura can my word be trusted?
String.Dest: 谎言！荆棘骑士口中的一派胡言。毕竟，我曾试图刺杀过伯爵夫人！阿祖拉啊，要我怎么说你们才肯信呢？

String.Source: A love triangle, huh? Makes sense to me.
String.Dest: 三角恋爱，哈? 我好感动。

String.Source: It makes perfect sense. Yes, the Countess is an old and decrepit woman, and yes any red-blooded scoundrel would prefer her blossoming daughter.
String.Dest: 这完全讲得通。是的，伯爵夫人年老色衰，任何精力充沛的恶棍都会更喜欢她貌美如花的女儿。

String.Source: A love triangle, huh? Makes sense to me.
String.Dest: 三角恋爱，哈? 我好感动。

String.Source: However, I am a deviant. A knave. A cur. Of course my tastes would run counter to common sense.
String.Dest: 无论怎么讲，我都是个异类。是个无赖。是个混蛋。我的口味当然和大众背道而驰了。

String.Source: You assaulted a Countess?
String.Dest: 你在侵犯伯爵夫人？

String.Source: Yes, and she survived. Such is the depth of my failure. In fact, so pathetic am I that the Countess chose to exile me rather than take my head.
String.Dest: 是啊，她活下来了。而我犯下了如此滔天大罪。事实上，多可悲啊，伯爵夫人到底是选择放逐了我，而非要了我的脑袋。

String.Source: You assaulted a Countess?
String.Dest: 你在侵犯伯爵夫人？

String.Source: One final insult for the Knight of Thorns! To be pitied rather than scorned!
String.Dest: 这是对荆棘骑士的侮辱！宁可被怜悯不可被蔑视！

String.Source: Wasn't there an order long ago named the Knights of the Thorn?
String.Dest: 很久以前是不是有个叫索恩骑士戒律的东西？

String.Source: Yes, that was an order founded by a previous Count, Farwil Indarys, one of the heroes of the Oblivion Crisis.
String.Dest: 是的，那是一个由前任伯爵组建的团体，法维尔·因得里斯, 湮灭危机的一位英雄。

String.Source: Wasn't there an order long ago named the Knights of the Thorn?
String.Dest: 很久以前是不是有个叫索恩骑士戒律的东西？

String.Source: At one point, however, one of his descendants, who disliked the thorny sigil, decided to alter it to suit her tastes. She was fond of roses.
String.Dest: 然而在这点上，他的一个后代却不喜欢那个带刺儿的标志，于是决定按照自己的口味改变它。她更喜欢玫瑰花。

String.Source: Wasn't there an order long ago named the Knights of the Thorn?
String.Dest: 很久以前是不是有个叫索恩骑士戒律的东西？

String.Source: So the Knights of the Thorn became the Order of the Roses. Fighters chosen as much for their incorruptible honor as their skill in battle.
String.Dest: 所以荆棘骑士成为了玫瑰教团。这些被选中的战士们必须拥有不朽的荣誉，如同拥有高超的战斗技巧一样重要。

String.Source: Wasn't there an order long ago named the Knights of the Thorn?
String.Dest: 很久以前是不是有个叫索恩骑士戒律的东西？

String.Source: We were the unsullied. The unspoiled. Every single member a rose without a thorn.
String.Dest: 我们是纯洁无暇，未受污染的。每名成员都是一朵无刺的玫瑰。

String.Source: Wasn't there an order long ago named the Knights of the Thorn?
String.Dest: 很久以前是不是有个叫索恩骑士戒律的东西？

String.Source: That is who you speak with. An Elf who betrayed not just the Countess, not just her ancestors, but the very ideal of what a knight aspires to be.
String.Dest: 这就是你的谈话对象。一个并非仅仅背叛了伯爵夫人，也并非仅仅背叛了她的祖先，而是背离了骑士所应当具有的崇高理想的精灵。

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: The dumb brute stared at me for what seemed like hours, before letting out a grunt and chewing on the goat carcass that he dragged to the alcove.
String.Dest: 那个畜生沉默的盯着我很长时间，然后冷哼了一声，开始啃咬他拖到壁厢那里的山羊尸体。

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: If that wasn't humiliating enough, he proceeded to tear out a chunk of flesh and offer it to me like I was a pet.
String.Dest: 如果这还不足以让人感到羞辱，他接着又撕下了一块肉给我，就像我是他的宠物一般。

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: I lacked the courage to refuse. I sank my teeth into the meat like a feral dog, and let its blood restore my vitality.
String.Dest: 我没有拒绝的勇气。我像野狗一样撕咬着肉块儿，用它的鲜血来回复我的活力。

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: Rather than face my death with honor, the next morning I used that strength to flee north, crossing the border to Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我没有带着荣誉直面死亡，在第二天我用尽全力逃离穿过天际省边境，逃向北方。

String.Source: Tell me about the night the Countess was stabbed.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲伯爵夫人遇刺那晚的事儿。

String.Source: Why certainly! That night I was drinking and whoring as I usually did, after spending the morning pretending to be chaste.
String.Dest: 还用问嘛！那天晚上我跟平常一样喝了一通后点了个妹子侍寝，一早过后装作自己还是个纯洁小处男。

String.Source: Tell me about the night the Countess was stabbed.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲伯爵夫人遇刺那晚的事儿。

String.Source: Then I donned my helm and in full armor, I stumbled over to the Countess' chambers, sending the guards on an assignment to Oblivion.
String.Dest: 于是我戴上头盔并全副武装，跌跌撞撞地冲进伯爵夫人的房间，把守卫们都送去了湮灭之境。

String.Source: Tell me about the night the Countess was stabbed.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲伯爵夫人遇刺那晚的事儿。

String.Source: I pounded the door of her bed chamber, awaking the Countess. "Urgent business," I said, "is the Count with you?"
String.Dest: 我猛敲伯爵夫人卧室的门，叫醒了她。“我有重要的事情。”我说，“伯爵和你在一起吗？”

String.Source: Tell me about the night the Countess was stabbed.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲伯爵夫人遇刺那晚的事儿。

String.Source: She told me the Count was in Bruma, discussing some territorial dispute over the Countess' buttocks.
String.Dest: 她告诉我伯爵在冬至城，忙着议论那些领土争端而将她冷落在一旁。

String.Source: Tell me about the night the Countess was stabbed.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲伯爵夫人遇刺那晚的事儿。

String.Source: Then I told her that I had "good news, and bad news." The good news was she wouldn't be in pain for long. Then I gave her the bad news.
String.Dest: 然后我告诉她，我有个“好消息和坏消息”，好消息是她不会痛苦太久的。然后我把坏消息告诉了她。

String.Source: Tell me about the night the Countess was stabbed.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲伯爵夫人遇刺那晚的事儿。

String.Source: When I was finished, I did what most traitors do. I defiled the corpse and then laughed maniacally, before returning to my bed chamber for a nap.
String.Dest: 当事情都干完了，我就做了件叛徒常做的事。我大声狂笑着羞辱了那具尸体，然后回到自己的卧室睡觉。

String.Source: That story was ridiculous and obviously untrue.
String.Dest: 那个故事又可笑又毫无可信度。

String.Source: Oh? Who is to say what is true and untrue? The court steward, that's who. Unless you are him, then it does not matter what you think.
String.Dest: 哦？那你知道是谁来评判这究竟是真还是假？是宫廷总管。除非你是他，否则你的想法根本毫无意义。

String.Source: I can only assume you crawled out of the Ogre's backside like a piece of manure.
String.Dest: 我只能假定你像坨屎一样从那个怪物的背后爬了出来。

String.Source: Ha! You tell it true. That is, if I were dignified enough to qualify as fecal waste.
String.Dest: 哈，你说得真对！就是说，如果我那时足够高贵得去做。

String.Source: I can only assume you crawled out of the Ogre's backside like a piece of manure.
String.Dest: 我只能假定你像坨屎一样从那个怪物的背后爬了出来。

String.Source: I have no doubt my infamy reached this particular Ogre's ears, as even he would not deign to gnaw on my traitorous bones.
String.Dest: 我毫不怀疑这头巨魔早就对我的名声有所耳闻，而就连他都没法嚼碎我这把硬骨头。

String.Source: How did you manage to escape?
String.Dest: 你打算怎么逃跑？

String.Source: What do you want to hear? That I survived by guile? Determination? Bravery? Those are not the attributes of a turncoat.
String.Dest: 你到底想听什么？我靠诡诈幸存下来？还是决心？勇敢？这些可不是一个叛徒该有的品质。

String.Source: How did you manage to escape?
String.Dest: 你打算怎么逃跑？

String.Source: I survived because my executioner had second thoughts. Because even the Ogres find my existence unpalatable.
String.Dest: 我能活下来是因为那个刽子手在砍我之前犹豫了一下。因为就连巨魔都觉得我的存在让它们非常不快。

String.Source: Just how virtuous was this Order?
String.Dest: 这是这个命令多么善良啊。

String.Source: We did more than obey the laws of Gods and Men. To fight lust, we swore an oath of celibacy. To fight indolence, we promised to be punctual.
String.Dest: 我们做的比单单遵守人神之律要多得多。为了战胜情欲，我们许下了禁欲的誓言。为了战胜懒惰，我们保证绝对守时。

String.Source: Just how virtuous was this Order?
String.Dest: 这是这个命令多么善良啊。

String.Source: To fight passion, we refused to drink, and to fight greed, we often shared our spoils with the townsfolk.
String.Dest: 为了战胜狂热，我们拒绝饮酒，为了战胜贪欲，我们经常将自己的战利品分享给市民。

String.Source: Just how virtuous was this Order?
String.Dest: 这是这个命令多么善良啊。

String.Source: We swore an oath to more than the Count. We swore to uphold the very essence of virtue.
String.Dest: 我们许下的誓言可比这个伯爵多多了。我们宣誓维护美德的本质。

String.Source: Just how virtuous was this Order?
String.Dest: 这是这个命令多么善良啊。

String.Source: We were more than just honorable, more than mere knights. We were immaculate.
String.Dest: 我们不仅仅是光荣的，也不仅仅是骑士。我们是完美的。

String.Source: Just how virtuous was this Order?
String.Dest: 这是这个命令多么善良啊。

String.Source: Hmph. Emphasis on the word "were." The Knight of Thorns does not smell like a rose. He is a poisonous vine, and his touch is venom.
String.Dest: 哼。强调“以前”是。荆棘骑士可不像玫瑰一样芳香。他是一条毒藤，触碰时都带着毒液。

String.Source: Or perhaps I'll just stay here and keep drinking, and build a new legacy as the Knight of a Thousand Beers. Now leave me be!
String.Dest: 又或者我就呆在这儿不停喝酒好了，顺带打造一个“千杯不倒骑士”的新传奇。现在让我清静会儿吧！

String.Source: But that's an idyllic answer, and I suspect the very same one a certain traitor used to deceive the fools in Cheydinhal.
String.Dest: 但这真是个不错的回答，而且我没记错的话，某个叛徒在夏丁赫尔欺骗傻瓜时用的正是这句话，一模一样。

String.Source: For who can trust the words of the Knight of Thorns, Tamriel's most reviled turncoat! Now leave me be. I must drink.
String.Dest: 敬那些能够相信荆棘骑士言语的人们，全泰姆瑞尔最应该遭到斥责的叛徒！现在放我一个人待一会吧，我得喝了。

String.Source: About time.
String.Dest: 是时候了。

String.Source: Away with you.
String.Dest: 和你一起。

String.Source: Be gone.
String.Dest: 滚开。

String.Source: Make it quick.
String.Dest: 快点好吗？

String.Source: Speak.
String.Dest: 说。

String.Source: What?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: I will stand guard until you return.
String.Dest: 我会一直守卫这里，直到你回来。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: Virtue guide us.
String.Dest: 美德指引我们。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: I bid you farewell then, until we meet again.
String.Dest: 该是告别的时候了，期待我们再次相逢。

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Understood.
String.Dest: 了解。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: I will do what I can for a fellow knight.
String.Dest: 我会为我的骑士同伴竭尽所能。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Of course. We are a fellowship, and our goods are owned by all.
String.Dest: 当然了。我们是伙伴，共同拥有这些物资.

String.Source: I need to trade some items with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交易些东西。

String.Source: Let me know if there is anything else that you require.
String.Dest: 如果你有什么需要的话告诉我。

String.Source: Even the Knight of Thorns would deny such a proposal. It simply cannot be done.
String.Dest: 即使是荆棘骑士也会拒绝这样的提议。绝对不能那么做。

String.Source: I cannot in good conscience do such a thing.
String.Dest: 我不能违背良心做这种事。

String.Source: It will be done.
String.Dest: 包在我身上。

String.Source: How can I be of service?
String.Dest: 有什么可以帮忙的？

String.Source: An inn. The smell of liquor permeates the air. To think I spent weeks imbibing such poison. The very thought makes me feel tarnished.
String.Dest: 一家客栈，酒香四溢……我在这祸泉魔浆中沉浸了许久，最终辜负了这具皮囊。

String.Source: The Order of the Rose had a lodge that was built during the Oblivion Crisis. There are times when I miss sleeping in a bed of my own.
String.Dest: 玫瑰教团在湮灭危机期间设立了一个部门。那是一段我就连睡在自己的床上都会失眠的日子。

String.Source: At the old Braidwood Inn, I would toss my flagon about and sing bandit tunes. I knew the melody, but most of the words I pulled from the ether.
String.Dest: 在那陈旧的辫枝旅店，我会一边摇晃着自己的酒壶，一边大唱强盗之歌。我对这旋律熟得很，虽然大部分的词儿都是我瞎编的。

String.Source: I once looked down upon rogues as failures of moral conscience. Now I know how easy it is to fall prey to debasement.
String.Dest: 我曾经瞧不起那些流氓道德良知的败坏。但现在我知道了堕落是多么容易。

String.Source: In Kynesgrove, I often heard of the plight of the Dunmer in Windhelm. It is a shame that some rulers need to be reminded how to be selfless.
String.Dest: 在基耐森林，我常常听说暗精灵在风盔城的困境。有些统治者不被警醒一下就不懂得无私，真是丢人。

String.Source: Riften. I doubt I would have survived a season here. I would have fallen into an abyss so deep that not even the light of Aetherius could reach me.
String.Dest: 裂谷城。我不知道自己能在这里苟延残喘上多久。我会跌入无底的深渊，甚至就连艾瑟瑞斯的光芒也无法到达我身边。

String.Source: I have heard Markarth is known for blood, silver, corrupt politics. After all I have endured, I rather not embroil myself in the latter.
String.Dest: 我听说马卡斯城因鲜血，银矿，和腐败的政治而出名。毕竟这些苦难我都已经受过了，以后我还是少卷入这些里面为好。

String.Source: Have you ever passed by the docks here and thought of just sailing away? Even when I was a knight, I often dreamt of faraway lands.
String.Dest: 你在经过码头时是否产生过启帆远航的念头？就算在我还是骑士的时候，我也经常梦想着去远方的土地。

String.Source: Citizens come to the Temple of Mara for love. As a Knight of the Rose, I never gave into such emotions. They feel foreign. Obscure.
String.Dest: 公民们来到玛拉神殿是为了爱情。作为一名玫瑰骑士，我从不被这种情绪所累。那种感觉陌生，又模糊。

String.Source: Dawnstar and the Sea of Ghosts. I had never seen the ocean until I came to Skyrim. Even now, its very breadth astounds me.
String.Dest: 晨星城和幽灵之海。在来天际省之前，我从没见到过海。即使是现在，它的宽阔无垠仍让我惊讶不已。

String.Source: I will never again wear an armor painted in white. But a dried, blackened rose is still beautiful in its own way. Even with thorns.
String.Dest: 我再也不会穿白色的盔甲了。 但是玫瑰即使发黑干枯，也依然保持着它独特的美感。 就算跟荆棘搭配在一起也是一样。

String.Source: Sometimes I still hum those bandit tunes...I can't help myself. I dare say it has become a part of who I am.
String.Dest: 有时我仍然会哼一哼那些强盗的曲子......我就是忍不住。我敢说这已经成为了我内心的一部分。

String.Source: The first time I heard the song about the maiden, it was from a bandit I slew. That night, I failed miserably to remove it from my head.
String.Dest: 这首关于一名少女的歌，我最开始是从一个被我杀掉的强盗口中听到的。那天晚上，我辗转难眠，还是没能把它移出我的脑海。

String.Source: One night, the Countess heard me humming a bandit song, and she asked me if I knew the bard who crafted it. She was the only one more naive than I.
String.Dest: 有天晚上，伯爵夫人听到了我在哼唱一首强盗的曲子，她问我知不知道创作那曲子的吟游诗人是谁。她是唯一一个比我更单纯的人。

String.Source: Vampires. Their existence is an affront to the people of this province. We must clear this lair of all them.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼。他们的存在对天际省的人来说是个威胁。我们必须把这个巢穴的吸血鬼收拾干净。

String.Source: Dark Elves have an affinity for magic, but I never sought to develop it. Like with warlocks, the practice of it always seemed to carry a taint.
String.Dest: 黑暗精灵对魔法有亲和力,但我从没想过往那方面发展。跟术士一样，这种做法看起来似乎总是带着一个污点。

String.Source: The Warlocks of Quickwater Cave terrorized the people of Cheydinhal for many years. It is imperative we put an end to such dark practices.
String.Dest: Quickwater Cave 的亡灵法师恐怖统治夏丁赫尔的人民已经很多年了。终止这个黑暗的时代是很有必要的。

String.Source: The Falmer are said to have given up their mortal form. Was this the path I had set for myself as the Knight of Thorns? I shudder to think of it.
String.Dest: 据说雪精灵是放弃了他们凡人的形态才变成了现在的样子。这难道就是我作为荆棘骑士所选择的前路？我觉得不寒而栗。

String.Source: The Falmer remind me of the goblins back in Cyrodiil. Vicious. Volatile. And bald.
String.Dest: 这个雪精灵让我想起以前在赛瑞帝尔见过的那些哥布林。它们一样的恶毒，善变，头顶上也都光溜溜的。

String.Source: The barrows of the undead have no place in a lawful society. The Draugr must be laid to rest.
String.Dest: 古墓里的亡灵们在正常社会之中没有一席之地，尸鬼们必须回到永恒的宁静之中。

String.Source: I confess I am not entirely familiar with the intricacies of trade and commerce. The Knights were provided with weapons and armor through service.
String.Dest: 我承认我对于商业贸易的复杂环境不完全在行。骑士们在供职时武器和护甲都是上头发的。

String.Source: In Cheydinhal, we prayed at the Chapel of Arkay when returning home from battle. May the Divines protect us all.
String.Dest: 在夏丁赫尔，从战场归来时我们会在阿尔凯的教堂里祈祷。愿圣灵保佑众生。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Ugh!
String.Dest: 呃！

String.Source: That will not be enough to best me!
String.Dest: 三脚猫的功夫还想赢我！

String.Source: Aaaaayyargh!
String.Dest: 啊~~~咿呀！

String.Source: Hyaarrgh!
String.Dest: 哈呀啊啊啊！

String.Source: Eyaarrgh!
String.Dest: 咿呀！

String.Source: This is the end!
String.Dest: 结束了！

String.Source: Gods take you!
String.Dest: 见你的上帝去吧！

String.Source: Easily parried!
String.Dest: 没打到！

String.Source: You cannot win!
String.Dest: 你赢不了的！

String.Source: A mortal is nothing without virtue!
String.Dest: 失了节操的凡人什么都不是！

String.Source: Fall to me!
String.Dest: 给我跪下！

String.Source: Why do you think that is?
String.Dest: 为什么你会那样想？

String.Source: Perhaps I cared more about the title of being virtuous than the ideals themselves.
String.Dest: 也许我在乎的只是“德高望重”这个头衔而不是它的内容。

String.Source: Why do you think that is?
String.Dest: 为什么你会那样想？

String.Source: When I was a child, they said I had to be perfect if I wanted to become a knight.
String.Dest: 在我还是个孩子的时候，他们说如果我想成为一名骑士，那么我必须完美无缺。

String.Source: Why do you think that is?
String.Dest: 为什么你会那样想？

String.Source: The person you see before you is far from perfect, but when it comes to my knighthood, I will do my best to prove them wrong.
String.Dest: 站在你面前的那个人并不是完人，但我绝不会允许任何人质疑我的骑士精神。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: When the White Rose became stained in blood, I became a fraud in the eyes of the people. And yet in the eyes of the Gods I committed no crime.
String.Dest: 当白玫瑰被鲜血玷污的时候，我在人们眼中成了欺诈者。但是在诸神的眼中，我未犯下任何罪行。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: I could have remained unsullied. But instead, I chose to debase myself.
String.Dest: 我本可以一直保持清白的。但正相反，我选择了丑化自己。

String.Source: Sorry, not this time.
String.Dest: 抱歉，下次。

String.Source: (Laughs) Very well. Then perhaps later, when I have flushed this poison from my body. For now, my eternal gratitude will have to do.
String.Dest: (笑声)很好。也许在我把这毒素从我身体里排出以后吧。而现在，你赢得了我永恒的感激之情。

String.Source: I would be honored.
String.Dest: 我会很荣幸。

String.Source: As would I. Call on my service then, when you need me. Until then, I will do my best to flush the poison out of my body.
String.Dest: 我会那么做的。当你需要我的时候，就叫上我吧。在那之前，我会尽力把这些毒素排出体外的。

String.Source: I would be honored.
String.Dest: 我会很荣幸。

String.Source: And know that regardless of whether you seek my blade, you will forever have my gratitude.
String.Dest: 不管是不是你找回了我的剑，我都永远感谢你。

String.Source: Just take it easy. You're useless if you slip and break your legs.
String.Dest: 慢慢来，步子太大容易扯着蛋。

String.Source: (Laughs) I assure you, the days when I was of brittle bones are long passed. It is only my mind that seems easily fractured.
String.Dest: (笑声)我向你保证，我再也不是以前那个孬种了。只是我心理承受能力还稍差一点。

String.Source: Just take it easy. You're useless if you slip and break your legs.
String.Dest: 慢慢来，步子太大容易扯着蛋。

String.Source: Yet as I overcame one affliction, I will try once more with this one. Huzzah to you, my friend, and-
String.Dest: 我们会用这个再试一次。万岁我的朋友，还有。。

String.Source: Well said. When the day is done, no mortal will be able to defy our knighthood.
String.Dest: 说得好！等到成功的那一天，没人能否认我们的骑士身份！

String.Source: Yes, whether they think us roses or thorns, we are in the end, Knights of Cheydinhal. Huzzah, my friend, and-
String.Dest: 恩哼，不管他们以为我们是玫瑰还是荆棘，归根结底，我们都是夏丁赫尔的骑士。万岁，我的朋友，而且……

String.Source: Hiram and I still believe you will answer the call.
String.Dest: 希伦和我仍然相信你会响应召唤。

String.Source: I give up. Stay here and wallow.
String.Dest: 我放弃了。还是留在这里打滚吧。

String.Source: Stop feeling sorry for yourself and start acting like a knight.
String.Dest: 像个骑士那样战斗！不要为自己的所作而感到遗憾。

String.Source: (Sigh) Acting, yes. That's what the Steward said. It was all an act.
String.Dest: （叹气）做戏，是的。正如管家说的那样，全都是在演戏。

String.Source: Stop feeling sorry for yourself and start acting like a knight.
String.Dest: 像个骑士那样战斗！不要为自己的所作而感到遗憾。

String.Source: What a jarring moment, to be told that everything you are was but a creation of your own imagination.
String.Dest: 被告知你所经历的一切都不过是你自己想象出来的，这一刻是多么令人震惊啊！

String.Source: Stop feeling sorry for yourself and start acting like a knight.
String.Dest: 像个骑士那样战斗！不要为自己的所作而感到遗憾。

String.Source: What I am doing now is getting acquainted with that person. Getting to know the real me. This knight you speak of is a farce. Leave him be.
String.Dest: 我现在所做的一切都是在试着熟悉那个人，去认识真正的自己。你说的那个骑士只是一出滑稽剧。由他去吧。

String.Source: You're putting your own pride ahead of the safety of the villagers.
String.Dest: 你正将你所谓的荣耀凌驾于所有村民的安全之上。

String.Source: (Sigh) They say selflessness is what makes a knight. We are sworn to serve. Prepared to give one's life for what is right.
String.Dest: (叹气) 他们说无私是一个骑士的重要品质。我们宣誓奉献，时刻准备着为真理而献身。

String.Source: You're putting your own pride ahead of the safety of the villagers.
String.Dest: 你正将你所谓的荣耀凌驾于所有村民的安全之上。

String.Source: I live in exile as a traitor, for that is my role. That is how I serve. In life, to do right by some, will do wrong to others.
String.Dest: 我被当成一个叛徒而流亡在外，因为那就是我的角色，那就是我生活的方式。在现实生活中，对一些人来说正确的事，在另一些人看来未必正确。

String.Source: You're putting your own pride ahead of the safety of the villagers.
String.Dest: 你正将你所谓的荣耀凌驾于所有村民的安全之上。

String.Source: So go. Leave this selfish cur.
String.Dest: 走吧。离开这个自私的小人。

String.Source: What if I gave you money?
String.Dest: 如果我给你钱？

String.Source: Yes...gold. Like a common mercenary. There was a time when I would have been insulted by the mere suggestion.
String.Dest: 是啊……钱。就像一个寻常佣兵一样。之前有段时间我还曾为这个提议而感到备受侮辱。

String.Source: What if I gave you money?
String.Dest: 如果我给你钱？

String.Source: Have I sunk so low that I will entertain such a notion? Is my soul so tarnished that I am willing to barter it? (Sigh) I...I wish to be alone.
String.Dest: 我已经沦落到愿意接受这种想法的地步了么？我的灵魂已经肮脏到能接受这种交易的程度了么？（叹气）我……我想一个人静一静。

String.Source: I am in need of a scoundrel to join the bandits in the plunder of Kynesgrove.
String.Dest: 我需要一个恶棍去加入那群强盗，然後掠夺基耐森林。

String.Source: Then you have come to the right Elf. With whom or what shall we fornicate first?
String.Dest: 那你找对精灵了。那我们应该先上谁？或是什么？

String.Source: I am in need of a scoundrel to join the bandits in the plunder of Kynesgrove.
String.Dest: 我需要一个恶棍去加入那群强盗，然後掠夺基耐森林。

String.Source: I suggest we have our stomachs bed this flagon of ale that has found its way to my table.
String.Dest: 我建议我们先让我们的肚子把这罐自己送上门来的麦芽酒给办了吧！

String.Source: You're pathetic. Worse than that. You're a coward.
String.Dest: 你真可悲。不，比这还糟。你是个懦夫。

String.Source: You forgot filthy, lewd, and drunk out of his wits! Although I do admit, cowardly does have a nice ring to it.
String.Dest: 你忘了他肮脏，下流和耍酒疯的样子了吗！虽然我不得不承认他的懦弱看起来还不错。

String.Source: You're pathetic. Worse than that. You're a coward.
String.Dest: 你真可悲。不，比这还糟。你是个懦夫。

String.Source: Of course, if there is one thing the Knight of Thorns truly fears, it is sobriety! Another drink, innkeeper!
String.Dest: 当然了,如果荆棘骑士真的有畏惧之物的话,那就是保持清醒了！掌柜的,给我再来一杯！

String.Source: Not even the worst scoundrel will do nothing and watch these people die.
String.Dest: 就算是最糟糕的恶党也不会束手旁观的看着这些人死去。

String.Source: No, you are right. The Knight of Thorns would not stand idly by while people suffer.
String.Dest: 不，你是对的。荆棘骑士不会在人民遭受苦难时袖手旁观。

String.Source: Not even the worst scoundrel will do nothing and watch these people die.
String.Dest: 就算是最糟糕的恶党也不会束手旁观的看着这些人死去。

String.Source: He would join the rogues and inflict more suffering, which is precisely what I plan to do when they arrive.
String.Dest: 他会加入那群流氓，遭受更多的痛苦，恰恰就像他们到达时我所计划的那样。

String.Source: I ask that you lend your blade to save this small village.
String.Dest: 我请求你贡献出你的刀以拯救这个小村庄。

String.Source: Save (hiccup) the village? The Knight of Thorns does not save villages! You clearly have had too much to drink, and I clearly haven't had enough.
String.Dest: 拯救(嗝) 村子？荆棘骑士可不会去拯救村子！你显然已经喝得太多了，而我显然还没喝够。

String.Source: I ask that you lend your blade to save this small village.
String.Dest: 我请求你贡献出你的刀以拯救这个小村庄。

String.Source: Why are you hoarding the liquor, soldier? As your superior officer, I demand you pour me another!
String.Dest: 你为什么要把酒藏起来，士兵？作为你的长官，我命令你给我倒一杯！

String.Source: Speak.
String.Dest: 说。

String.Source: What is it now? What do you ask of the Knight of Thorns? Murder? Theft? Fornication?
String.Dest: 现在又怎么了？你要向荆棘骑士问什么？谋杀？盗窃？还是通奸？

String.Source: I'll have you know I am no ordinary scoundrel, but a master of all three.
String.Dest: 我会让你知道我不是普普通通的恶棍，而是个在这三方面登峰造极的大师。

String.Source: Well, what of it, adventurer? Will you take the Knight of Thorns as your squire?
String.Dest: 呃，这样如何，冒险家？你愿意让荆棘骑士做你的护卫吗？

String.Source: I want to thank you. I was a fool.
String.Dest: 我想对你表示感谢。我是个傻瓜。

String.Source: Part of me tried to convince myself I was protecting the Countess, but in truth, I was ashamed.
String.Dest: 我内心的一部分试过说服自己我是为了保护伯爵夫人，但事实上，我很羞愧。

String.Source: I do not know. Perhaps I will follow our friend here. Not every knight serves a court. Some simply serve the greater good.
String.Dest: 我不知道。也许我会跟随我们的这位朋友。并不是每一个骑士都为公正而战，有一些单纯只是为了更多的利益。

String.Source: No, Hiram. You are your own man, and as I am no longer a Knight of the Rose, that is true now more than ever.
String.Dest: 不，希兰。你本来就不是奴仆，而且我也不再是玫瑰骑士，所以你现在是真的自由了。

String.Source: Give the Countess my regards.
String.Dest: 代我向伯爵夫人问好。

String.Source: Yes, and the people have you to thank, Knight of the Rose. You do the Order proud.
String.Dest: 是啊，人民会感谢你，玫瑰骑士。教团为你所做的一切感到自豪。

String.Source: What? They're here!
String.Dest: 什么？他们在这儿呢！

String.Source: Thank you, Hiram.
String.Dest: 谢谢你, 希兰。

String.Source: You are mistaken. I am not who you think I am. It is possible I never was.
String.Dest: 你误会了。你认识的那个人其实并不是我。恐怕从来都不是。

String.Source: Still, even a broken Elf may be of some use. My fallen corpse could trip a bandit or two as they march upon this village.
String.Dest: 但是，就算一个身体残缺的精灵依然会有用武之地。我的尸体躺在这里，也许会绊倒一两个冲着村子来的强盗。

String.Source: And what about the Knight of Thorns? Surely you can find use for one who knows the mind of his enemy.
String.Dest: 荆棘骑士怎么样？你肯定能用得上一个了解敌人的人。

String.Source: When I was a child, they said my bones were too brittle to be a knight. I was afflicted with an illness that left me a dry, wilted rose.
String.Dest: 当我还是个孩子的时候，他们说我骨头太脆，不能成为一名骑士。我得了一种疾病，把我变得如同一朵干枯的玫瑰。

String.Source: They said the only way I could survive was if I was perfect. If I could somehow manage to parry every blow.
String.Dest: 他们说只有我本事过硬才可能生还。如果我能够想办法挡住每一次攻击的话。

String.Source: They were right. I am broken. And all it took was a single mistake.
String.Dest: 他们是对的。我坏掉了，而这所有的一切也都只是个错误。

String.Source: Leave me.
String.Dest: 别来烦我。

String.Source: Her hips were a chalice and her bosom a palace and I stabbed it with the end of my knife!
String.Dest: 她的腰身像个高脚杯一样，那臀部……还有她的胸部，哦我的天，就像一座宫殿一样！然后我一点也没跟她客气，就把事儿办了。

String.Source: Oh, there once was a lady as fair as an evening in Springtime of old Stros M'Kai!
String.Dest: 噢，曾经有一位女子跟老斯图尔斯·迈凯的春夜一般无二！

String.Source: Innkeeper! Another round of mead for the Knight of Thorns!
String.Dest: 老板！再给荆棘骑士来几瓶蜜酒！

String.Source: Have you ever wondered how they coax the bees to make such delicious honey? This mead is rather delectable.
String.Dest: 你有没有好奇过这一点，他们到底是怎样哄骗那些蜜蜂让它们酿出如此美味的蜂蜜来的啊？这蜜酒真是太赞了。

String.Source: You should stop being such a bore and try some.
String.Dest: 你能不能不要这么烦。

String.Source: Hiram, my boy, have you ever wondered...
String.Dest: 希兰,我的孩子，你是否曾好奇过......

String.Source: Alassea and I will be here then.
String.Dest: 艾拉希和我会在这里的。

String.Source: I need more time.
String.Dest: 我需要更多时间.

String.Source: After you.
String.Dest: 你先请。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: Are you ready, Dragonborn?
String.Dest: 准备好了吗，龙裔？

String.Source: Understood. Given how dangerous it might be, we will outside the tavern until you arrive.
String.Dest: 明白。鉴于这可能很危险，在你到达之前，我们会在客栈外候着。

String.Source: You two head on to Robber's Refuge without me.
String.Dest: 你们俩去劫匪庇护所却不叫上我。

String.Source: My lady, that is one argument you will not win.
String.Dest: 我的女士，这是一场您无法获胜的争论。

String.Source: Water, believe it or not. Although on occasion I will drink tea.
String.Dest: 水，爱信不信。虽然在很偶然的情况下我也喝茶。

String.Source: If by some miracle you manage to stay here, I will, my lady. However, I have a feeling you will be returning to Windhelm sooner than you think.
String.Dest: 如果你真的奇迹般的想在这个地方再待会儿的话，我会的，夫人。虽说我总感觉你会回去风盔城，比你自己想的要快。

String.Source: I suppose then this is where we part ways. I must return to Windhelm to arrest Grenier.
String.Dest: 我想该是分开的时候了。我必须回风盔城逮捕格雷尼尔。

String.Source: I suppose then this is where we part ways. I still need to question Grenier's acquaintances. You never can be too sure.
String.Dest: 这就是我们分开的地点。我还是要问问格雷尼尔的熟人。谨慎点总是好的。

String.Source: Wait, you do realize this is a known hideout for criminals, don't you?
String.Dest: 等等，你明白这是个窝藏罪犯的地方，对吧？

String.Source: What are you implying?
String.Dest: 你在暗示什么？

String.Source: Let's not be hasty. There may be others hiding in the other rooms. We should clear the area.
String.Dest: 稍安勿躁，其他屋内也许仍有人藏身。我们应肃清这片区域。

String.Source: I'd advise you not to make such crude statements to the lady.
String.Dest: 我劝你不要在这位女士面前用如此粗俗的语言。

String.Source: We're just fine, thank you.
String.Dest: 我们没问题，多谢。

String.Source: Ideally I'd like to get the servers to safety. That may prove difficult considering how wide open this space is.
String.Dest: 理想情况下我要保证那些侍者的安全。可在这种敞开的空间真是有难度啊。

String.Source: Of course, there's no guarantee the servers aren't bandits themselves.
String.Dest: 当然，谁也不能担保这些侍者本身并非强盗。

String.Source: I am thankful we were able to put a stop to the murders.
String.Dest: 我很欣慰我们能够阻止这场谋杀。

String.Source: I am sure the tavern will do quite well under your stewardship.
String.Dest: 我相信在你的管理下这家酒馆的生意会很红火。

String.Source: Then I will follow, and serve with honor.
String.Dest: 我将紧随其后，为荣耀而战。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Let us show this world that chivalry is not dead.
String.Dest: 我们来让这个世界瞧瞧，骑士精神是不死的。

String.Source: We fight for the greater good.
String.Dest: 我们为更大的利益而战。

String.Source: This humble knight awaits your orders.
String.Dest: 您卑微的骑士正等待着您的指令。

String.Source: I am here to serve the cause of good.
String.Dest: 我将为正义而战。

String.Source: We have stopped. What can I do for you?
String.Dest: 我们停下了。是需要我做什么吗？
